1. 12 Biceps: milk jug curl or weightless flex curls (squeeze your biceps as hard as possible with no weight) [or dumbbell curl]
2. 12 Triceps: Bodyweight skullcrushers against a tabletop or close grip pushups [or dumbbell floor skullcrushers]
3. 12 Abs: Bicycle crunch or reverse crunch
4. 12 Calves: Standing calf raise (use backpack, milk jug or dumbbell to load)
